comment.author: 31126217@N04
comment._content:
I am writing in regards to our charity, LiterAid.org. We are a charity that is newly setting up in the UK. Our main goal is to make an impact in the lives of people from all over the world by providing books where they are needed most, contributing to the continuous education of world’s population. I have seen this photo and immediately loved it and want to use it for our main page on our website. Since we are a non-profit organization, I hope you will help us out and give us permission to use this photo on our main page. Could you please get back to us on info@literaid.org weather or not this is OK with you. We would like to take your permission before we use your photo anywhere. Thank you.

Best Wishes,
LiterAid Team

comment.author: 23686862@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/31126217@N04] Hi LiterAid, we have sent you a message at your email.  Cheers!
